column5: We just got back from a 4 day trip up to Medhurst lake and we had a great time. by the end of the trip my daughter was throwing back 16" fish and saying "just anothe little one"I would recommend this to anyone. great accomodations, great fishing and super service!www.ontariowilderness.com
Nice! I wish I had those problems, lol!Did you get a chance to try out Spotted Lake as well?

Agreed, Medhurst is a very fine outpost and Air Dale is just an overall great operator. Just wish their prices were a teeny bit lower, I'd use them all the time. Nice to hear you had such a good trip!

We went up to spotted lake and hammered the pike over three Days we caught our limit of small and medium but only Two Large between 4 of us . Second basin from the portage right Up the middle. We even left an anchor with the canoes.
